name: The Tv show game.
description:
This is the annual 1000 000 dollars popular  game in china. You start the game with one million dollars, but  if you fail  to solve  the puzzle or riddle, you  loose each time 10 000 dollars...

controls   : wasd or  arrows keys ,  enter key to talk  or to take a stone. 

press space key to check combination. 

there is only 2 puzzles, i was short in time.

music credits
